subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Larry Donnell caught a 12-yard touchdown pass from Eli Manning with 21 seconds to play, and the Giants moved to the top of the N.F.C. East by beating San Francisco for their third straight win.
snippet: Larry Donnell caught a 12-yard touchdown pass from Eli Manning with 21 seconds to play, and the Giants moved to the top of the N.F.C. East by beating San Francisco for their third straight win.
